Items.Title: Resolution authorizing the Department of Information Technology & Telecommunications, also known as the Office of Technology and Innovation, to extend the Franchise, allowing for the extension of the Agreement for the Installation, Operation, and Maintenance of Public Communications Structures in the Boroughs of the Bronx, Brooklyn, Manhattan, Queens and Staten Island (as amended).
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorizing the New York City Department of Information Technology & Communications to extend a franchise agreement, allowing for the installation, operation, and maintenance of public communications structures in the NYC Boroughs.

Items.Title: Resolution authorizing the Department of Transportation to enter into a coordinated street furniture franchise for the installation, operation and maintenance of Coordinated Street Furniture in the Boroughs of the Bronx, Brooklyn, Manhattan, Queens and Staten Island.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorizing the DOT to enter into a coordinated street furniture franchise for the installation, operation and maintenance of Coordinated Street Furniture in the Boroughs of the Bronx, Brooklyn, Manhattan, Queens and Staten Island.

Items.Title: Resolution authorizing the Department of Information Technology & Telecommunications, also known as the Office of Technology and Innovation, to extend the Franchise, allowing for the extension of the Agreement for the Installation, Operation, and Maintenance of Public Communications Structures in the Boroughs of the Bronx, Brooklyn, Manhattan, Queens and Staten Island (as amended).
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Authorizing the New York City Department of Information Technology & Communications to extend a franchise agreement, allowing for the installation, operation, and maintenance of public communications structures in the NYC Boroughs.

Items.Title: Resolution authorizing the Department of Transportation to enter into a coordinated street furniture franchise for the installation, operation and maintenance of Coordinated Street Furniture in the Boroughs of the Bronx, Brooklyn, Manhattan, Queens and Staten Island.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Authorizing the DOT to enter into a coordinated street furniture franchise for the installation, operation and maintenance of Coordinated Street Furniture in the Boroughs of the Bronx, Brooklyn, Manhattan, Queens and Staten Island.
